author: Sahil Kapur and Marianna Sotomayor
title: Coronavirus turns China into 2020 election issue
description: Both candidates are scrambling as voters look to hold China accountable for allegedly concealing information about and failing to contain the virus.
content:
WASHINGTON When President Donald Trumps super PAC released a TV ad campaign this week painting Joe Biden as soft on China, the apparent Democratic nominee's campaign and outside allies immediately mobilized a full-court press to counter the attack.
America F… [+4822 chars]
